name: Bellcom Open Source ApS
tag_list: open-source, drupal, ecommerce, newspaper, commerce, custom-made
overview:
Bellcom is a company that delivers Open Source based software to Companies. The following areas of expertize is offered:

Open Source hosting services - including Open Source software on Windows. Web solutions of any kind, based on Open Source Software. Solutions have been provided on platforms such as. Ez-publish, Drupal, Post Nuke, Joomla, Oscommerce, Magento, Wordpress, Buddypress, Payment gateways etc.

Open Source Development for all of the mentioned systems. Inkluding all other Open Source Based solutions.

Support for all Open Source Based solutions. So if you want to try Open Source but need supoprt to back you up, just call.
